title: Android Pie Phones: When will your mobile get the update?
description:
![Android
Pie](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg) Credit: Google

**The latest version of Google‚Äôs mobile operating system,[Android
Pie](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/android-pie), started rolling out
to smartphones in early August, bringing with it a range of tweaks and major
new features including a brighter UI, gesture navigation, an adaptive battery
mode and updated volume controls.**

Google‚Äôs Pixel line of phones, were, of course, amongst the first handsets to
receive the Android Pie update. The [Google
Pixel](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/google-pixel), [Google Pixel
XL](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/google-pixel-xl), [Google Pixel
2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/google-pixel-2), [Google Pixel 2
XL](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/google-pixel-2-xl) and ‚àí of course
‚àí the brand new [Google Pixel
3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/google-pixel-3) and [Google Pixel 3
XL](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/google-pixel-3-xl), are all on the
latest version of Android. The [Nexus
6P](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nexus-6p) and [Nexus
5X](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nexus-5x), meanwhile, miss out,
having been released in 2015.

And a steadily increasing number of Android phone manufacturers have either
already brought Pie to their handsets, or teased the software update‚Äôs
impending arrival. Read on to find out which phones will receive the Android
Pie update, and when to expect it to arrive.

**Read more:[How to download Android
Pie](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-download-android-
pie-3412898)**

## Essential Android Pie phones

> We‚Äôre proud to bring Android 9 Pie to Essential Phone the same day it‚Äôs
released! Check your phone now for the update. ü•ß
[pic.twitter.com/pniUDl9yr8](https://t.co/pniUDl9yr8)

>

> ‚Äî Essential (@essential) [August 6,
2018](https://twitter.com/essential/status/1026516461907369984?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

Essential took everybody by surprise by making the Android Pie update
available to [Essential Phone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/essential-
phone-rubin-release-date-price-specs-features-modular-accessories-2950215)
users on day one of the software‚Äôs release ‚àí spraying egg all over the faces
of its bigger-name rivals in the process.

One of the key reasons for this might just be that Essential has its work cut
out convincing people that its phone is actually worth buying. The company has
reportedly shelved plans for a second device, and keeping its current flagship
updated might be the best way to try to drum up sales.

  * 

## HTC Android Pie phones

> We're pleased as pie to confirm updates to Android Pie for the HTC U12+,
U11+, U11, and U11 life (Android One). Timeframes for roll-out will be
announced in due course.

>

> We can't wait to know what you think of Google's freshest slice of Android!
[pic.twitter.com/mPJePFegne](https://t.co/mPJePFegne)

>

> ‚Äî HTC (@htc) [August 10,
2018](https://twitter.com/htc/status/1028000627794706432?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

HTC may be struggling with bigger issues at the moment, but it has confirmed
that the following phones will receive the Android Pie update:

  * [HTC U12 Plus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/htc-u12-plus)
  * [HTC U11 Plus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/htc-u11-plus)
  * [HTC U11](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/htc-u11)
  * [HTC U11 Life](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/htc-u11-life)

Unfortunately, there‚Äôs been no word yet on when exactly the rollout will
happen.

**Read more:[Best smartphone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
smartphone-3431175)**

## Huawei Android Pie phones

Huawei has dipped its fingers into Android Pie out in China, where the
software update is being tested on the [Huawei Mate 10
Pro](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/huawei-mate-10-pro), [Huawei
P20](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/huawei-p20), [Honor
10](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/honor-10) and [Honor View
10](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/honor-view-10). They‚Äôll almost
certainly get bumped up everywhere else in due course, and the new [Huawei
Mate 20 Pro](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/huawei-mate-20-pro) and
[Huawei Mate 20](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/huawei-mate-20) will
ship with Android Pie already onboard.

## LG Android Pie phones

Another company that‚Äôs struggling to shift handsets is LG, but unlike HTC the
South Korean firm has been very quiet on the Android Pie front. Bizarrely, the
new [LG V40 ThinQ](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-v40-thinq-release-
date-specs-price-uk-3593224) ships with Android Oreo, but Android Police
[reports](https://www.androidpolice.com/2018/10/03/v40-lgs-answer-galaxy-
note-9-used-week/) that the handset will be updated to Pie ‚Äúsoon‚Äù.

## Motorola Android Pie phones

## ![Motorola Android 9 Pie Moto G6 Moto
E5](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Motorola has announced that the following phones will receive the Android Pie
update:

  * Moto Z3
  * [Moto Z3 Play](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/moto-z3-play-release-date-specs-price-3482112)
  * [Moto Z2 Force](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-z2-force)
  * [Moto Z2 Play](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-z2-play)
  * [Moto X4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-x4)
  * [Moto G6 Plus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-g6-plus)
  * [Moto G6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-g6)
  * [Moto G6 Play](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-g6-play)

So far, all we have to go on in terms of timeframe is this autumn, but you can
keep an eye on [this page](https://support.motorola.com/us/en/softwareupgrade)
for the latest developments.

## Nokia Android Pie phones

> Everybody wants a piece of the Pie! ü•ß
[#Nokia7Plus](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Nokia7Plus?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
is now on pure Android 9‚Ñ¢. Your device will be smarter, faster, and adapt as
you use it. Which is your favorite feature?
[#Android9](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Android9?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
[pic.twitter.com/LPp5OKnAHQ](https://t.co/LPp5OKnAHQ)

>

> ‚Äî Nokia Mobile (@NokiaMobile) [September 28,
2018](https://twitter.com/NokiaMobile/status/1045603433359728641?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

Nokia started rolling the Android Pie update out to the [Nokia 7
Plus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-7-plus), a handset that
runs [Android One](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinion/what-is-android-
one-2924502) (a version of Android that‚Äôs been specifically optimised for
affordable phones), on September 28.

‚ÄúWe are extremely delighted to start the roll out of Android 9 Pie on Nokia 7
Plus ‚Äì making us among the first to offer the latest innovations from Google,
including Android One exclusive features such as App Notifications, to the
value flagship tier,‚Äù said Juho Sarvikas, HMD Global‚Äôs chief product officer.

Nokia has also confirmed that the following phones will be upgraded to Android
P:

  * [Nokia 3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-3)
  * [Nokia 5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-5)
  * [Nokia 6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-6)
  * [Nokia 8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-8)

## OnePlus Android Pie phones

OnePlus started rolling out the Android 9 Pie update to UK-based [OnePlus
6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-6) users on October 16.

The company first made the Pie update available with the [OxygenOS 9.0
update](https://forums.oneplus.com/threads/oxygenos-9-0-for-the-
oneplus-6.909533/) on September 21, around a month and a half after the update
first landed. However, it was a limited, random rollout, and OnePlus told
users that leveraging a VPN in an attempt to trigger the update wouldn‚Äôt
necessarily work.

The company has also
[confirmed](https://www.weibo.com/1110411735/GDUK6tTBg?type=comment) that the
[OnePlus 6T](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/oneplus-6t-release-
date-3525032) will ship with Android Pie, and that the following phones will
receive the Android Pie update too:

  * [OnePlus 5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-5)
  * [OnePlus 5T](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-5t)
  * [OnePlus 3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-3)
  * [OnePlus 3T](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-3t)

The OnePlus 6 will be followed by the 5 and 5T, followed by the 3 and 3T,
though OnePlus is yet to reveal exactly when the update will roll out.

Unfortunately, [a Weibo
post](https://www.weibo.com/1110411735/GE31Iwqd5?from=page_1005051110411735_profile&wvr=6&mod=weibotime&type=comment)
from OnePlus CEO Pete Lau says the firm‚Äôs engineers ‚Äústill need some time‚Äù to
bring Android Pie over to the OnePlus 5 series and OnePlus 3 series.

## Samsung Android Pie phones

No official announcement has been made by Samsung, but we _surely_ won‚Äôt have
to wait too much longer for Android Pie to reach the likes of the [Samsung
Galaxy Note 9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-note-9),
[Samsung Galaxy S9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-s9),
[Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-
galaxy-s9-plus) and [Samsung Galaxy Note
8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-note-8).

The company is known to be testing the update, and the folks at [XDA
Developers](https://www.xda-developers.com/android-pie-beta-samsung-
galaxy-s9-hands-on/) have obtained a pre-release copy of the official beta,
which will apparently ‚Äúbe released very soon‚Äù.

![samsung galaxy s9 plus android
pie](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Image Credit: Android Police

[Android Police](https://www.androidpolice.com/2018/10/25/new-leak-shows-
samsung-experience-10-android-9-pie-screens-galaxy-s9-beta/) has also
published several screenshots showing what the upcoming Samsung Experience 10
(based on Android Pie), will look like on the S9 Plus. The biggest things of
note are a new font, Samsung‚Äôs own take on Android‚Äôs new Gesture Navigation,
and larger, clearer type in the Quick Settings menu.

Unfortunately, there‚Äôs no news yet on precisely when the beta will begin
rolling out to users, or when the final version will be made available.

Unfortunately, owners of the firm‚Äôs lower-end phones, as this [leaked update
roadmap](https://www.xda-developers.com/samsung-mid-range-phones-android-
oreo-2019/) reveals, might have to wait a fair while for Pie ‚àí Oreo, which
came out a year ago, is only due to reach some of these phones as late as
March 2019.

**Read more:[Best Android phones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
android-phones-3438996)**

## Sony Android Pie phones

![sony android pie
phones](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Sony‚Äôs new flagship, the recently released [Sony Xperia
XZ3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz3) runs Android Pie
out of the box. However, the company has also started rolling out the Android
9 Pie update to users of the [Sony Xperia
XZ2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz2) and [Sony Xperia
XZ2 Compact](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz2-compact)‚Ä¶
far earlier than expected.

Sony had initially said the the handsets would get the Pie update in November,
but the update started appearing as early as October 12.

What‚Äôs more, in a [blog
post](https://blogs.sonymobile.com/2018/10/18/android-9-pie-update-on-more-
xperia-devices/), the company has said that more early updates are coming, and
the rest of the handsets earmarked for Android Pie are ‚Äúbang on schedule.‚Äù

The following handsets started getting the update on October 26:

  * [Sony Xperia XZ Premium](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz-premium)
  * [Sony Xperia XZ1](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz1)
  * [Sony Xperia XZ1 Compact](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz1-compact)

The [Sony Xperia XZ2 Premium](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sony-xperia-
xz2-premium-uk-release-3533344), meanwhile, will be treated to the Android Pie
update on November 7.

And finally, the models listed below, will be bumped up from March 4, 2019:

  * [Sony Xperia XA2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xa2)
  * [Sony XA2 Ultra](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xa2-ultra)
  * Sony Xperia XA2 Plus

Sony has also published a detailed infographic explaining why it can take so
long for Android version updates to reach non-Google phones, which you can
find [here](https://blogs.sonymobile.com/2018/08/16/can-update-xperia-android-
pie/#gref). You can read a breakdown of the process
[here](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/android-update-delays-
sony-3535556).

**Have you tried out Android Pie for yourself yet? Share your early
impressions with us on Twitter @TrustedReviews.**
